text:
Deliv | Senior Software Engineer | Menlo Park, CA | Full-time | ONSITE

Join us in disrupting logistics and setting the new standard for last mile delivery, a multibillion dollar market. We are a b2b service, behind the scenes of 4000+ national omni-channel retailers, e-commerce players and businesses (i.e. Best Buy, Walgreens, Kohl’s, Williams-Sonoma, Google Shopping Express), transforming how goods move around a city. Deliv has completed a C-round, and is backed by global logistics leader UPS, Google, leading Venture Capital investors including Upfront Ventures and RPM Ventures, and the nation’s top REIT investors.

We're looking for talented individuals to help us empower our driver partners through intuitive mobile experiences, provide robust APIs to make integrating with us painless, ensure service levels and cost efficiency with our real-time routing system, and more!

We are looking for full stack Ruby on Rails Software Engineers. https://www.deliv.co/careers/

Contact: lingan[at]deliv.co
